means: 将（书等）放置在架子上( shelve的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Atlanta has shelved plans to include golf in the 1996 Games.
sentence.Network_cn: 亚特兰大已搁置了将高尔夫球纳入1996年奥运会的计划。

sentence.Network_en: The government has shelved the idea until at least next year.
sentence.Network_cn: 政府决定把这个想法先放一放，至少推迟到明年再说。

sentence.Network_en: Plans to expand the company have had to be quietly shelved.
sentence.Network_cn: 公司扩充的计划不得不悄悄搁置下来.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The project was shelved because of lack of capital., 该项方案因资金短缺被搁置起来了.
The books were shelved in alphabetical order ., 书按字母顺序排放在书架上.
The books were shelved in alphabetical order ., 书按字母顺序排放在书架上.
shelved the issue ;, 推迟处理这个问题;

settee; chaise longue 长靠椅shelving combination 组合架？shoe rack 鞋架

entry.tran: 搁置，停止执行，暂不进行(计划、项目)
entry.def: If someone shelves a plan or project, they decide not to continue with it, either for a while or permanently.

example.ex: Atlanta has shelved plans to include golf in the 1996 Games...
example.tran: 亚特兰大已搁置了将高尔夫球纳入 1996 年奥运会的计划。

example.ex: Sadly, the project has now been shelved.
example.tran: 不幸的是，计划现在已经搁浅。

entry.tran: (近海或海底陆地)向下倾斜,成斜坡
entry.def: If an area of ground next to or under the sea shelves, it slopes downwards.
Shelves is the plural of shelf .

auth_sentence.content: Somehow, I think these projects might be shelved.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Somehow, I think these projects might be shelved.

auth_sentence.content: Mr Thomas said the legislation was later shelved.

auth_sentence.content: Or those nuclear power plants that Clinton shelved.
auth_sentence.res_content: Or those nuclear power plants that Clinton shelved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Or those nuclear power plants that Clinton shelved.
